PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-04272010-03-25,  ,  INDUSTRY,  , 
ActPublic Service Labour Relations Act
SubjectNRC - Operational Category **COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT**
PrecisOrder approving the entry by the NATIONAL RESEARCH COUNCIL OF CANADA into a COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the RESEARCH COUNCIL EMPLOYEES' ASSOCIATION covering all employees in the OPERATIONAL CATEGORY Bargaining Unit, for a four-year period expiring on July 30, 2011.
